Work in Progress

Computational Electromagnetics, Elasticity, Seismology and Related

Computational science in fields dominated by wave equations.

Computational Fluid Dynamics, Kinetic Equations and Multiphysics

All of the above including applications.

High-Performance Computing

Includes programming for GPU or TPU for scientific applications.

Inverse Problems and Scientific Data Analysis

Scientific computing for image and signal processing and related fields. Also data assimilation.

Machine Learning in Scientific Computing

Applied machine learning, model reduction and digital twinning.

Classical Numerical Analysis

Interpolation, approximation, linear and tensor algebra, ordinary and partial differential equations, integral equations, special functions etc.; all except optimization.

Numerical Optimization, Operational Research and Control

Primarily continuous optimization.

Computational Science and Engineering, Other

Any CSE that does not belong in the more focused comp-* pages.

Quantum Computing for Computational Science

Quantum computing and quantum algorithms for applications.

Uncertainty Quantification in Scientific Computing

Uncertainty quantification and related topics.

Algorithms and Complexity

Algorithms, computational complexity, data structures, computational geometry.

Logic in Computer Science

Logic, formal languages and automata.

Computer Science - Optimization

Discrete and combinatorial optimization, (mixed) integer programming.

Computer Science - Other

Temporary calendar for events not yet classified.

Computer Science - Quantum Computing

Algorithms and hardware for quantum computing from the CS perspective

Nuclear Structure and Reactions

Calendar of meetings in the general field of nuclear structure and reactions—nuclear physics and nuclear data for energy and other applications.

Plasma Physics and Fusion Energy Science

Focused on high-temperature plasma, fusion energy and astrophysical plasma.

Ionized Gases and Plasma Chemistry

Ionized gases, low-temperature plasma and plasma chemistry.

Atomic Processes in Plasma, Warm and Hot Dense Matter

Atomic and molecular processes in high temperature plasma, warm and hot dense matter.

Plasma-Material Interaction and Related Materials Science

Plasma-material and particle-surface interactions and related fusion-relevant materials physics.

Statistics - Theory

Meetings in the general area described by arXiv code stat-th, including Foundations, Asymptotics, Testing, Estimation, Regression, Bayesian and Frequentist Inference, Decision Theory.

Statistics - Machine Learning Theory

Meetings in the general area described by arXiv code stat-ml, including supervised, unsupervised, semi-supervised learning, graphical models, reinforcement learning, bandits, high dimensional inference, etc.

Statistics - Methodology and Computation

Selected (major) events in the area described by arXiv codes stat.ME (Methodology) and stat.CO (Computation), including Design, Surveys, Model Selection, Multiple Testing, Smoothing, Spatial Statistics, Survival Analysis, Nonparametric and Semiparametric Methods, Algorithms, Simulation, Visualization. (Maybe also Signal and Image Processing, Time Series?) (I tend to assign to stat-th before stat-me.)

Statistics - Other

Probability and statistics meetings focused on applications or otherwise not classified elsewhere.

Probability Theory

Foundations, probability on algebraic, combinatorial and geometric structures, distributions, asymptotics. Random matrix theory, percolation theory and statistical physics of spin systems is classified under probability.

Stochastic Processes

Key words include stochastic processes, stochastic analysis, stochastic differential equations, stochastic dynamics, spatial stochastics, stochastic geometry, martingales, Markov processes, Lévy Processes, Brownian motion, queuing theory.

Quantum Chemistry

Calendar in progress.

Quantum Materials

Calendar in progress.

Quantum Molecules

Calendar in progress.

Plasma Light Sources

Calendar in progress; to be delimited or abandoned.

Ultrafast Quantum Physics

Electron dynamics, intense light, quantum optics.

Spintronics

Spintronics and related control.

To be Determined

Anything not yet Classified.

Related

Relevant Organizations.
